com.mobius.vdrapi
Class ApiVerifierResult

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.ApiVerifierResult
public class ApiVerifierResult
extends Object

This class contains the results of a specific test requested by the user when calling ApiVerifier.getResult. It presents the test's Pass/Fail status, and if it failed, provides the related the error message - both the original error message text and any customized error message text, if applicable.

Method Summary
 String getOriginalMessage()
          Returns the default message text explaining the error.
 String getUserMessage()
          Returns the customized error message text, if any.
 boolean testPassed()
          Returns whether or not the test was passed.
